Articles.Content:
While not *my* proudest moment on KSP, the proudest moment on my Dododyne Propulsion save. (And yes, I'm thinking about renaming them all John.) I still consider myself a rank newbie (the memorial conveniently hides the vast graveyard of failed missions) and I've almost given up on the game in frustration, but this was fun.

And of course here's Dododyne's rough draft Logo (the flag can be seen in the images).

It should be obvious why I am not entering the company logo contest.

(I've fussed over trying to get the album to embed, but I'm doing something wrong, it was only two images anyways) I also hope this is in the right forum.
